entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
